title: About ece
content:
1. Does ece requires lot of memorization
2. In which semester do we need a laptop for ece

comments.body:
1.  every subject is math, you need to be good at math or have a work ethic to be able to make up for it, there's not much memorization except for derivations and formulas, but everything else is pure math and logic based thinking. 




2. You will probably not need a new laptop, most ece applications are not high in gpu requirement, and the rest are already in the ece labs in the college pcs, so dw about laptop at all until absolutely necessary.
thankyou for replaying, i am above avg at maths(98%ile in both mains) . at present i do not have a laptop and want to delay buying it so can i complete 3-4 sems without it?
you may not require a laptop for ECE related works initially (until sem 3). But may require for college assignments and if you wanna work on some other skills

You will require laptop for first year as its difficult to learn programming language without implementing it. However if you already have a desktop, its adjustable. 

Personally would suggest you buy a laptop within mid of sem 1 atleast.
